data.text:
Exciting News! EuroCIS 2024 - The Leading Trade Fair for Retail Technology is just around the corner, happening from February 27 to 29, 2024, in DÃ¼sseldorf. Join the Who's Who of Europe's retail technology sector for an exceptional opportunity to explore cutting-edge solutions and products that will shape the future of retail. This year's theme is "Go beyond today," and it promises to be a game-changer for the industry. Expect: - Extensive networking with retail tech experts - Comprehensive lineup of side events - Innovative solutions for Merchandise & Supply Chain Management, POS, HR, Robotics, Security, and more The hottest topics on the agenda: - Customer Centricity - AI & Machine Learning - Payment - Connected Retail - Seamless Store - Smart Energy Management EuroCIS 2024 has already surpassed expectations with record exhibitor numbers and floor space booked months before the event. Don't miss the chance to stay ahead of the curve in retail technology. Plus, get a sneak peek at XPONENTIAL Europe, a new trade fair for unmanned and autonomous systems, at the event, set to be held alongside EuroCIS starting in 2025. Be part of the future of retail! Mark your calendars and stay updated at https://lnkd.in/eD36PU3t. #EuroCIS2024 #RetailTech #Innovation #FutureOfRetail

Join us at EuroCIS - The Leading Trade Fair for Retail Technology 2024, at Hall 10 B41 to discover how Ariadne is revolutionizing the physical retail landscape with unparalleled store customer analytics. At EuroCIS 2024, Ariadne will be showcasing our latest solutions for unravelling the complexities of customer interactions and transforming them into actionable insights. ðŸ“ŒGain a clear understanding of shopper behaviour, flow and patterns. Optimize store layouts and product placement for increased customer engagement. ðŸ“ŒEnhance real-time responsiveness to shopper dynamics and improve customer satisfaction. ðŸ“ŒSimplify Your Space with Intuitive Ariadne Navigation and lead customers directly to their product of interest, maximizing their shopping experience. ðŸ“ŒPersonalize the shopping experience with targeted communication and offers. Meet the Sebastian Deppe, VP DACH, Maximilian Dorfmeister: Key Account Manager DACH, and Francesco Vasta,Global Key Account Manager at Hall 10 B41. BOOK A MEETING NOW! https://lnkd.in/dNVnm5wx #EuroCIS2024 #Ariadne #RetailAnalytics #CustomerExperience #InstoreAnalytics

By using NFC technology for its contactless smart tickets, The Brussels Intercommunal Transport Company - STIB - provides a seamless, efficient, and user-friendly experience for its passengers. This year, Beontag is also enabling thousands of visitors to get to Labelexpo , happening this week in Brussels. The solution, developed by Confidex | a Beontag company, has played an important role in enhancing travel across the 19 municipalities of the Brussels-Capital Region. #beontag #confidex #LABELEXPOEUROPE2023

We are excited to announce our participation at the NRF (National Retail Federation) exhibition, the world's largest retail trade show from 14th to 16th January 2024. This year, we are focusing on retail and apparel, showcasing our cutting-edge technology. With just under a month until #NRF2024, we're gearing up for exciting demonstrations on booth 4456. Our global team, including experts from SATO America, SATO Europe, and SATO Holdings Corporation, will be detailing the impactful journey of 'Data Creation to Data Utilisation' across the supply chain. We'll highlight how to leverage data to drive innovation in the retail and apparel sectors and how our solutions in Data Collection, Labelling, and Tagging for Sustainability, integrating technologies like RFID, Robots, BLE, PaaS, and AI, are reshaping retail operations. Meet our European delegation at NRF 2024: Laurent Lassus, Head of Europe Richard Cross, Sales Manager UK & Ireland Benoit GOURLAY, General Manager France & Maghreb Detlev MÃ¼ller, Managing Director, SATO Europe GmbH Javier Barandica, General Manager Iberia Charlene Hignett, Retail Business Development Manager Join us to discuss how SATO can enhance your business and dive into the future of retail innovation. NRF 2024 is set to be a hub of new ideas and technologies, and we can't wait to share our insights and solutions with you. #SATO #oneSATO #SATOEurope #NYC #NRF2024 #RetailInnovation #SATOEurope #DataUtilisation #SupplyChainSolutions

Ever heard of RFIDs? You probably have used one if youâ€™ve ever been to festivals or marathons. RFID is the acronym for radio-frequency identification and is normally distributed in the form of wristbands. It is used in accreditation to keep track of things such as race-timing and site-entry! #tfeventco #tfevents #RFID #eventtechnology #eventterms #eventmanagement #eventproduction #eventprofs #yvrevents #eventplanning #eventprofessionals #logistics
